titleStmt.title: An introduction to the sacrament, or, A short, plain, and safe way to the communion table being an instruction for the worthy receiving of the Lords Supper / collected for and familiarly addressed to every particular communicant.
titleStmt.author: Addison, Lancelot, 1632-1703.

notesStmt.note: Attributed by Wing to Lancelot Addison.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
Item at 339:21 incorrectly called A522 in Wing reel guide.
